entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
